import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { useNotification } from '../context/NotificationContext'; import '../styles/profile.css'; const Profile = () => { const { user, updateUser } = useAuth(); const { showSuccess, showError } = useNotification(); const [selectedBackground, setSelectedBackground] = useState(user?.coverImage || 'https://via.placeholder.com/1200x300/1a1a2e/FFD700?text=Daffy+Social'); const [selectedAvatar, setSelectedAvatar] = useState(user?.avatar || `https://via.placeholder.com/150x150/FFD700/000000?text=${user?.firstName?.charAt(0) || 'U'}`); const [showBackgroundModal, setShowBackgroundModal] = useState(false); const [showAvatarModal, setShowAvatarModal] = useState(false); const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); const [editData, setEditData] = useState({ firstName: user?.firstName || '', lastName: user?.lastName || '', bio: user?.bio || '', phone: user?.phone || '', department: user?.department || '', userType: user?.userType || '' }); const backgroundOptions = [ 'https://via.placeholder.com/1200x300/1a1a2e/FFD700?text=Daffy+Social', 'https://via.placeholder.com/1200x300/16213e/FFD700?text=University+Life', 'https://via.placeholder.com/1200x300/0f3460/FFD700?text=Student+Hub', 'https://via.placeholder.com/1200x300/533483/FFD700?text=Academic+Excellence', 'https://via.placeholder.com/1200x300/2d1b69/FFD700?text=Innovation+Center', 'https://via.placeholder.com/1200x300/1a1a2e/FFD700?text=Future+Leaders' ]; const avatarOptions = [ `https://via.placeholder.com/150x150/FFD700/000000?text=${user?.firstName?.charAt(0) || 'U'}`, 'https://via.placeholder.com/150x150/00A3FF/ffffff?text=U', 'https://via.placeholder.com/150x150/FF6B6B/ffffff?text=U', 'https://via.placeholder.com/150x150/4CAF50/ffffff?text=U', 'https://via.placeholder.com/150x150/FF9800/ffffff?text=U', 'https://via.placeholder.com/150x150/9C27B0/ffffff?text=U' ]; const handleBackgroundChange = (background) => { setSelectedBackground(background); const updatedUser = { ...user, coverImage: background }; updateUser(updatedUser); setShowBackgroundModal(false); showSuccess('Background updated successfully!'); }; const handleAvatarChange = (avatar) => { setSelectedAvatar(avatar); const updatedUser = { ...user, avatar: avatar }; updateUser(updatedUser); setShowAvatarModal(false); showSuccess('Profile picture updated successfully!'); }; const handleEditSave = async () => { try { const updatedUser = { ...user, ...editData }; updateUser(updatedUser); setIsEditing(false); showSuccess('Profile updated successfully!'); } catch (error) { showError('Failed to update profile'); } }; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setEditData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; if (!user) { return
Loading profile...
; } return (

setShowBackgroundModal(false)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>
